ygData.subject: FIGHT!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She knelt down on one knee and fired at the Maximals.  She could feel her energy slipping away.  But she wasn t going to let these maximals take her base

::KitKat::

She knelt down on one knee and fired at the Maximals.  She could feel 
her energy slipping away.  But she wasn't going to let these maximals 
take her base away and hurt any more of her team members.
She was leaking badly.  She kept firing.  She started feeling numb in 
her legs and arms.  Her torso wasn't hurting as much as it was. the 
pain was going away.

She opened her link,"Drillbit, just in case, I love you."  She closed 
her link and stood up on wobbly legs.  She stood out infront of the 
base and yelled at the maximals. "YOU LEAVE US ALONE.  YOU TOOK TWO 
OF MY FRIENDS, AND YOU'LL TAKE NO MORE WHILE I'M ALIVE!"  She opened 
fire on them.  She shot 4 grenades and shot her rifle at them.  She 
aimed at the Chosen ones and Deemos.  She shot two grenades at 
Blender and Stronghold.
